name: ADRD Diagnostic Criteria References
content: Diagnostic criteria for ADRD: NIA-AA criteria, NIA-AA, National Institute on Aging, Alzheimer's Association criteria, DSM-5, DSM-IV, ICD-10, ICD-11, NINDS-AIREN, NINCDS-ADRDA, DLB consortium criteria, Lewy body criteria, FTD criteria, Rascovsky criteria, McKhann criteria
